WorkItem.ClosedComment: not an issue (resource will be included in next release. for now compile the latest source yourself)
WorkItem.Description:
Version 1.0.3.0
.NET 4.0
The [use your own navigation framework snippet](https://mui.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=How%20to%20use%20your%20own%20navigation%20framework) is not working. During run time throws an exception 'Cannot find resource named 'EmptyWindow'. Resource names are case sensitive"

The usage code:
```
<mui:ModernWindow x:Class="myProject.Forms.myForm"
                  xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
                  xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
                  xmlns:mui="http://firstfloorsoftware.com/ModernUI"
                  xmlns:shell="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation/shell"
                  Width="300"
                  Style="{StaticResource EmptyWindow}"
                  Height="300"
                  ResizeMode="NoResize"
                  ShowInTaskbar="False">
```

Comments.Message: The ModernWindowEx.xaml dictionary, containing the EmptyWindow style is not available in the latest release yet, you'll need to get the latest source code and compile it yourself.
